remarks: Inner connectivity law for betweenness.  Theorem 5.3 of [Schwabhauser] p. 41.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2019.)
statement:
tgbtwnconn.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tgbtwnconn.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tgbtwnconn.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tgbtwnconn.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn3.1 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( A I D ) ) $.
tgbtwnconn3.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( A I D ) ) $.
tgbtwnconn3 $p |- ( ph -> ( B e. ( A I C ) \/ C e. ( A I B ) ) ) $.
